decoworld.editor.renderer

Class MapRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.editor.renderer.MapRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class MapRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    The map renderer for the editor - Please don't touch this, it's very finicky in its current state. Notes about threads:
    OpenGL is single-threaded, meaning that a context is tied to a single thread. Because of this, managed resources, cannot be modified on another thread. The solution to this is just to use a request queue that is checked every frame.

      • cacheTileSet

        public void cacheTileSet(TileSetWrapper ts)
        Cache all the TileSet Pixmaps, storing them as Textures. This gives a roughly 300% performance boost.
        Parameters:
        ts - The TileSet to cache.

      • uncacheTileSet

        public void uncacheTileSet()
        Uncache the currently-cached TileSet. Used for switching TileSets and cleaning up.
